prompt: ${you} must select a card to play

name: Standard Project
prompt: ${you} must select a basic project to play

name: Claim a milestone
prompt: ${you} must select a Milestone to claim

name: Fund an award
prompt: ${you} must select an Award to fund

name: Place Greenery Tile
prompt: ${you} must select a location to place a Greenery tile, adjacent if possible

name: Place City Tile
prompt: ${you} must select a location to place a city, cannot place adjacent to another city

name: Place Tile
prompt: ${you} must select a location to place a special tile

name: Discard Card from Hand
prompt: ${you} must select a card to discard

name: Discard Card from Hand to gain M€
prompt: ${you} must select a card to discard to gain 1 M€

name: Activate Card
prompt: ${you} must select a card to activate

name: Add resource to another card
prompt: ${you} must select a card to add ${count} ${restype_name} resource/s

name: Remove resource from another card
prompt: ${you} must select a card to remove ${count} ${restype_name} resource/s

name: Keep Card
prompt: ${you} must select a card to add keep

name: Buy Card
prompt: ${you} may select a card to buy for 3 M€

name: Keep Corp
prompt: ${you} must select one corporation card to keep

name: Draft Card
prompt: ${you} must select one card to draft (buy or discard later)

name: Pass
prompt: ${you} must confirm Pass for this generation, cannot be undone

name: Advanced Pass
prompt: ${you} must confirm skipping second action and Pass for this generation on your next turn, your turn will end now

name: Skip Second Action
prompt: ${you} must confirm skipping second action, turn cannot be undone after this

name: Draw Card in Hand
prompt: ${you} must confirm draw ${count} card/s, cannot be undone

name: Draw Card
prompt: ${you} must confirm draw ${count} card/s, cannot be undone

name: Confirm
prompt: ${you} must confirm or undo

name: Confirm
prompt: ${you} must confirm end of turn or undo (this undoes both actions if able)

name: Steal Plant
prompt: ${you} must select a player who will lose the resources

name: Steal Steel
prompt: ${you} must select a player who will lose the resources

name: Steal M€
prompt: ${you} must select a player who will lose the resources

prompt: ${you} must confirm spent 8 heat to increase temperature by 1 step

prompt: ${you} must confirm spent plants to place a Greenery
